Package org.apache.calcite.avatica.server

Interface AvaticaHandler

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle
All Known Subinterfaces:
MetricsAwareAvaticaHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAvaticaHandler, AvaticaJsonHandler, AvaticaProtobufHandler, DelegatingAvaticaHandler
public interface AvaticaHandler extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler
A custom interface that extends the Jetty interface to enable extra control within Avatica.
